mapper.select: SELECT brandCode ,brandName ,categoryLevel ,categoryId FROM ( /* 전사 브랜드 조회 쿼리 */ SELECT DISTINCT '0' categoryLevel ,categoryId as categoryId ,BRND_CD as brandCode ,BRND_NM as brandName FROM ( SELECT '0' categoryId ,B.BRND_CD ,B.BRND_NM FROM TB_MD_GDS_M A ,TB_MD_BRND_M B WHERE A.BRND_CD = B.BRND_CD AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND SUBSTR(A.GDS_SCLS_CD, 0, 2) IN ('01', '02', '03', '04', '05') GROUP BY A.GDS_SCLS_CD, B.BRND_CD, B.BRND_NM ) ORDER BY categoryLevel, CONVERT(brandName, 'ISO2022-KR') ) WHERE ROWNUM < 100
